name: Dr. Feelbad
description:
Dr. Feelbad

Play as Doctor Feelbad and help humble people lose weight with these new experimental tecniques!

HOW TO PLAY

Just decrease the weight of your customers by making holes in their bodies... by shooting them. Each of them has an optimal weight they wish to reach, so try to get as close to that number as you can.

Beware: if you go below the optimal weight, you will get sued!

The closer you get to the optimal weight, the more cash you will earn, which you can spend on new tools after each day of work.

You have limited time! Try and operate as many customers as fast as possible!

See if you can find the secret achievements!

CONTROLS

Left click to perform surgery on the patient.
Press Space to bring in the next patient.


See your total score at the end of the week and come back for more!
